TypeSignature.Value: public class UpdatePanel : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor, System.Web.UI.IUpdatePanel
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdatePanel extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor, class System.Web.UI.IUpdatePanel
Public Class UpdatePanel Inherits Control Implements IAttributeAccessor, IUpdatePanel
public ref class UpdatePanel : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IAttributeAccessor, System::Web::UI::IUpdatePanel
type UpdatePanel = class inherit Control interface IAttributeAccessor interface IUpdatePanel

summary.span: Enables sections of a page to be partially rendered without a postback.

span.span: Enables sections of a page to be partially rendered without a postback.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [正在重新整理 UpdatePanel 的內容Refreshing UpdatePanel Content](#refreshing_updatepanel_content) - [UpdatePanel 使用量UpdatePanel Usage](#updatepanel_usage) - [套用樣式Applying Styles](#applying_styles) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項是中央在 ASP.NET AJAX 功能的一部分。 controls are a central part of AJAX functionality in ASP.NET. 這些認證用於啟用局部網頁呈現的控制項。They are used with the control to enable partial-page rendering. 局部網頁呈現可在該頁面只有一部分更新時，減少需要同步回傳和完整網頁更新。Partial-page rendering reduces the need for synchronous postbacks and complete page updates when only part of the page has to be updated. 在局部網頁呈現可改善使用者經驗，因為它可以減少螢幕閃爍整頁回傳期間發生，加強網頁互動。Partial-page rendering improves the user experience because it reduces the screen flicker that occurs during a full-page postback and improves Web page interactivity. ## 正在重新整理 UpdatePanel 的內容Refreshing UpdatePanel Content 啟用局部網頁呈現時，控制可以執行更新整個頁面的回傳或更新的一個或多個內容在非同步回傳控制項。When partial-page rendering is enabled, a control can perform a postback that updates the whole page or an asynchronous postback that updates the content of one or more controls. 控制項是否會導致在非同步回傳和更新控制項取決於下列：Whether a control causes an asynchronous postback and updates an control depends on the following: - 如果屬性控制設為 、控制項的內容會在每次回傳來自網頁的更新。If the property of the control is set to , the control's content is updated on every postback that originates from the page. 這包括從控制項內其他的非同步回傳控制項並不是內部的控制項的回傳控制項。This includes asynchronous postbacks from controls that are inside other controls and postbacks from controls that are not inside controls. - 如果屬性設定為、控制項的內容會在下列情況下更新：If the property is set to , the control's content is updated in the following circumstances: - 當您呼叫方法明確控制。When you call the method of the control explicitly. - 當控制項內的另一個巢狀控制項，而且父面板會更新。When the control is nested inside another control, and the parent panel is updated. - 當回傳的起因是使用定義的觸發程序的控制項`Triggers`屬性控制項。When a postback is caused by a control that is defined as a trigger by using the `Triggers` property of the control. 在此案例中，控制項明確觸發面板內容的更新。In this scenario, the control explicitly triggers an update of the panel content. 控制項可以是內部或外部觸發程序相關聯的控制項。The control can be either inside or outside the control that the trigger is associated with. - 當屬性設定為`true`和子控制項的控制項造成回傳。When the property is set to `true` and a child control of the control causes a postback. 子控制項的巢狀控制項不會使外部更新控制除非明確定義為觸發程序。Child controls of nested controls do not cause an update to the outer control unless they are explicitly defined as triggers. 設定的組合屬性`false`和屬性不允許，且將會擲回例外狀況。The combination of setting the property to `false` and the property to is not allowed and will throw an exception. 當控制項執行的非同步 post 時，它會新增自訂 HTTP 標頭。When the control performs an asynchronous post, it adds a custom HTTP header. 某些 proxy 移除此自訂 HTTP 標頭。Some proxies remove this custom HTTP header. 如果發生這種情況，伺服器會當做一般的回傳，導致用戶端錯誤處理的要求。If this occurs, the server handles the request as a regular postback, which causes a client error. 若要解決此問題，當您執行非同步的文章來插入自訂表單欄位。To resolve this issue, insert a custom form field when you perform asynchronous posts. 請檢查標頭或伺服器程式碼中的自訂欄位。Then check the header or the custom form field in server code. ## UpdatePanel 使用量UpdatePanel Usage 您可以使用多個更新不同的控制項獨立頁面區域。You can use multiple controls to update different page regions independently. 當包含一或多個的頁面控制項先轉譯時，所有的所有內容都呈現與傳送到瀏覽器控制項。When the page that contains one or more controls is first rendered, all the content of all controls are rendered and sent to the browser. 在後續非同步回傳時，每個內容控制項可能不會更新，根據控制台設定值，並在用戶端或伺服器的邏輯，個別的面板。On subsequent asynchronous postbacks, the content of each control might not be updated depending on the panel settings and on client or server logic for individual panels. 您也可以使用控制項在下列案例：You can also use controls in the following scenarios: - 在使用者控制項。In user controls. - 在主版頁面和內容頁面。On master and content pages. - 巢狀方式置於其他控制項。Nested inside other controls. - 內部樣板化控制項，例如或控制項。Inside templated controls such as the or controls. 以宣告方式或以程式設計方式，可以加入控制項。 controls can be added declaratively or programmatically. 您可以加入控制項以程式設計的方式，但是您無法以程式設計方式加入觸發程序。You can add an control programmatically, but you cannot add triggers programmatically. 若要建立觸發程序類似的行為，您可以註冊為非同步回傳控制項的頁面上的控制項。To create trigger-like behavior, you can register a control on the page as an asynchronous postback control. 您可以呼叫方法控制項。You do this by calling the method of the control. 然後，您可以建立事件處理常式，以回應非同步回傳時，可以和中執行的處理常式，呼叫方法控制項。You can then create an event handler that runs in response to the asynchronous postback, and in the handler, call the method of the control. ## 套用樣式Applying Styles 控制項接受 expando 屬性。The control accepts expando attributes. 這可讓您設定控制項的呈現 HTMLelements CSS 類別。This lets you set a CSS class for the HTMLelements that the controls render. 例如，您可能會建立下列範例所示的標記：For example, you might create the markup shown in the following example: ``` ``` 在上述範例中的標記會轉譯 HTML 類似下面的網頁執行時：The markup in the previous example renders HTML similar to the following when the page runs: ```
``` ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例會顯示不同用法控制項。The following examples show different uses of the control. **UpdatePanel 控制項內部的控制項****Controls Inside an UpdatePanel Control** 下列範例示範如何將內部的控制項放控制項，以減少螢幕閃爍，當您張貼至伺服器。The following example shows how to put controls inside an control to reduce screen flicker when you post to the server. 在此範例中，和控制項位於控制項。In this example, a and a control are inside an control. 根據預設，屬性是和屬性是`true`。By default, the property is and the property is `true`. 因此，子控制項的面板會導致在非同步回傳。Therefore, child controls of the panel cause an asynchronous postback. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample1CS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample1VB.aspx#1)] **UpdatePanel 控制項的主要/詳細資料案例****Master/Detail Scenario with UpdatePanel Controls** 在下列範例中，控制項用在顯示訂單及訂單詳細資料，從 Northwind 資料庫的主要/詳細資料案例。In the following example, an control is used in a master/detail scenario that shows orders and order details from the Northwind database. 一個控制項包含顯示訂單清單的控制項。One control contains the control that displays a list of orders. 第二個控制項包含顯示一個訂單的詳細資料的控制項。A second control contains a control that displays the details of one order. 當您選取訂單的第一個表格時，第二個資料表會顯示該訂單詳細資料。When you select an order from the first table, details for that order are displayed in the second table. 第二個資料表會更新以非同步方式依據第一個資料表中的選取範圍。The second table is updated asynchronously based on the selection in the first table. 訂單摘要資料表中的排序和分頁作業也會導致部分更新。The sorting and paging operations in the orders summary table also cause partial updates. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample2CS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample2VB.aspx#2)] 如果您將內控制控制，設定控制項的屬性`true`不支援。If you put a control inside an control, setting the control's property to `true` is not supported. 不過，因為控制項支援非同步回傳，變更任何回傳內控制控制會造成相同的排序和分頁回呼行為。However, because the control supports asynchronous postbacks, any postbacks that change the control inside an control cause the same behavior as sorting and paging callbacks. **在範本中使用 UpdatePanel 控制項****Using an UpdatePanel Control in a Template** 在下列範例中，控制使用的項目範本的控制項。In the following example, an control is used in the item template of a control. 每個資料列中的控制項時自動產生。 controls in each data row are generated automatically. 每個資料列控制項包含控制項來顯示該資料列中的項目的數量和控制項來降低，並增加的數量。Each row's control contains a control to display the quantity of the item in that row and a control to decrease and increase the quantity. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample3CS.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample3VB.aspx#3)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 若要以動態方式加入控制項的頁面，建立新執行個體，並將子控制項新增到的執行個體由控制項物件屬性。To dynamically add an control to a page, create a new instance and then add child controls to the control object that is exposed by the instance's property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何動態建立控制，並將它加入至頁面。The following example shows how to dynamically create an control and add it to a page. 當您按一下按鈕在內控制項，訊息會重新整理的日期和時間。When you click the button inside the control, the message is refreshed with the date and time. 使用新增的子控制項屬性。Child controls are added by using the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/CS/UpdatePanelConstructorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/VB/UpdatePanelConstructorVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含可以用於封入的 CSS 樣式屬性的集合`div`元素控制項。The property contains a collection of CSS style attributes that can be used in the enclosing `div` element of the control.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether postbacks from immediate child controls of an control update the panel's content.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether postbacks from immediate child controls of an control update the panel's content.

value.span: 如果從直屬子系的回傳控制項的控制更新面板的內容，否則。

span.span: if postbacks from immediate child controls of the control update the panel's content; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性`true`如果您想從直屬子控制項的回傳控制項，讓更新的面板的內容。Set the property to `true` if you want postbacks from immediate child controls of the control to cause an update of the panel's content. 子控制項的巢狀控制項不會造成的父代更新控制項的內容，除非您呼叫方法明確定義成觸發程序在子控制項。Child controls of nested controls will not cause an update of the parent control's content unless you call the method explicitly or you define the child controls as triggers. > [!NOTE] > 當屬性設定為和屬性設定為`false`、期間擲回例外狀況方法。When the property is set to and the property is set to `false`, an exception is thrown during the method. 此屬性的組合不允許控制項。This combination of properties is not allowed for the control. 案例中，您可能會在其中設定至`false`時，您有兩個控制項，而且您想從第一個更新第二個面板的內容，但不更新本身的內容面板回傳。A scenario where you might set to `false` is when you have two controls and you want a postback from the first panel to update the content of the second panel but not update its own content. 例如，第一個面板可能購買的產品清單，而且第二個面板可能購物車。For example, the first panel might be a list of products to buy and the second panel might be a shopping cart.

summary.span: Gets or sets the template that defines the content of the control.

span.span: Gets or sets the template that defines the content of the control.

value.span: 定義的內容執行個體控制項。

span.span: An instance that defines the content of the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含的內容，會出現在控制呈現時。The property contains the content that appears inside an control when it is rendered. 以宣告方式或以程式設計方式，您可以建立範本的內容。You can create the template's content declaratively or programmatically. 內容範本控制項是單一執行個體範本。The content template of an control is a single-instance template. 因此，它包含的控制項的內容不能存取直接在網頁上使用方法。Therefore, the properties of the controls it contains can be accessed directly on the page without using the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. 若要加入項目到控制項以宣告方式，加入``開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。To add items to the control declaratively, add an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 內部``項目標記，宣告其他控制項和 HTML 項目。Inside the `` element tags, declare other controls and HTML elements. 若要加入項目到以動態方式控制，請使用屬性，可讓您新增的子控制項，而不需要建立實作的自訂範本介面。To add items to the control dynamically, use the property, which enables you to add child controls without having to create a custom template that implements the interface.

exception.span: The property of the control is set after an instance of the template is created or after the content template container is created.

span.span: The property of the control is set after an instance of the template is created or after the content template container is created.

span.span: A object that defines the content of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您以程式設計方式加入至子控制項控制項，而不必定義自訂的範本繼承自介面。The property enables you to programmatically add child controls to the control without having to define a custom template that inherits from the interface. 如果您要新增內容至控制以宣告方式或透過設計工具中，您應該將內容加入到屬性使用``項目。If you are adding content to the control declaratively or through a designer, you should add content to the property by using a `` element. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式指定屬性控制項。The following example shows how to programmatically specify the property of an control. 屬性控制項時，會設定`Button1`按下。The property of a control is set when `Button1` is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/CS/UpdatePanelConstructorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/VB/UpdatePanelConstructorVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會覆寫基底類別，並密封，以避免額外的衍生。The property is overridden from the base class and sealed to prevent additional derivation. 若要將控制項加入控制項以宣告方式，建立``元素內控制項標記。To add controls to the control declaratively, create a `` element inside the control markup. 若要將控制項加入以程式設計方式控制，請使用屬性。To add controls to the control programmatically, use the property.

summary.span: Creates a object that acts as a container for child controls that define the control's content.

span.span: Creates a object that acts as a container for child controls that define the control's content.

returns.span: A container for the control's content.

span.span: A container for the control's content.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法僅供使用的控制項開發人員想要擴充控制項。This method is intended for use by control developers who want to extend the control. 例如，在衍生類別中，您可以提供不同的根控制項，做為容器您控制項的內容。For example, in derived classes, you can provide a different root control that acts as a container for your control's content. 預設實作會傳回物件。The default implementation returns a object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫中自訂方法要呈現控制項`
`和``面板的內容項目。The following example shows how to override the method in a custom control to always render the `
` and `` elements for the panel's content. 自訂控制項定義的公用屬性，名為`GroupingText`也就是字串常值內``項目。The custom control defines a public property named `GroupingText` that is a string literal inside the `` element. 自訂控制項，名為`CustomUpdatePanel`衍生自和覆寫方法。A custom control named `CustomUpdatePanel` derives from and overrides the method. Put`CustomUpdatePanel`類別來源網站的 App_Code 資料夾中的程式碼。Put the `CustomUpdatePanel` class source code in the Web site's App_Code folder. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/CS/App_Code/CustomUpdatePanel.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/VB/App_Code/CustomUpdatePanel.vb#2)] 自訂控制項用在頁面上就像控制項。The custom control is used on the page just as the control is. 下列範例顯示包含自訂的頁面控制項。The following example shows a page that contains the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/CS/UpdatePanelCreateContentTemplateContainerCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/VB/UpdatePanelCreateContentTemplateContainerVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未啟用局部網頁呈現中, 所定義的觸發程序屬性不會初始化，因為它們沒有任何作用。If partial-page rendering is not enabled, the triggers that are defined in the property are not initialized because they have no effect. 屬性控制項取得或設定值，指出是否啟用局部網頁呈現。The property of the control gets or sets a value that indicates whether partial-page rendering is enabled. 屬性控制項取得或設定值，指出是否支援局部網頁呈現。The property of the control gets or sets a value that indicates whether partial-page rendering is supported.

span.para: 當您覆寫方法，請務必呼叫基底類別，因此如果有啟用局部網頁呈現，註冊觸發程序。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果屬性設定為、 內容的內 HTML 呈現控制項``項目。If the property is set to , the content of an control is rendered inside an HTML `` element. 如果屬性設定為，呈現在 HTML 內`
`項目。If the property is set to , it is rendered inside an HTML `
` element. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以宣告方式。The following example shows how to set the property declaratively. 控制項，名為`UpdatePanel1`會以 HTML 轉譯``項目。The control named `UpdatePanel1` is rendered in an HTML `` element. 如果屬性已設定為，因為的方式，在產生的一段會出現脫離 HTML`
`項目會呈現。If the property were set to , the resulting paragraph would appear disjointed because of the way in which the HTML `
` element is rendered. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得所有的觸發程序已定義的集合控制項。The property gets a collection of all the triggers that have been defined for the control. (您可以使用，以宣告方式定義觸發程序**UpdatePanelTrigger 集合編輯器**對話方塊設計工具中，或使用``元素控制項。)集合包含和物件。(You can define triggers declaratively by using the **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box in the designer or by using the `` element of the control.) The collection includes and objects. 宣告式觸發程序中所定義的集合不會追蹤在檢視狀態中。Declarative triggers that are defined in the collection are not tracked in view state. 命名的容器控制項的觸發程序使用時，其所有子控制項造成回傳的觸發程序都行為。When a control that is a naming container is used as a trigger, all its child controls that cause postback behave as triggers.

summary.span: Causes an update of the content of an control.

span.span: Causes an update of the content of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果當您叫用 [] 頁面上已啟用局部網頁呈現方法，瀏覽器中更新控制項的內容。If the page is enabled for partial-page rendering, when you invoke the method, the control's content is updated in the browser. 呼叫方法，如果您判斷所必須執行的伺服器程式碼是否應該更新控制項。Call the method if you have server code that must execute to determine whether an control should be updated. 如果您打算使用方法，設定屬性。If you plan to use the method, set the property to . 如果您想要更新邏輯伺服器中的面板決策，請確定屬性是`false`並沒有明確的觸發程序所定義的面板。If you want the decision to update the panel in server logic, make sure that the property is `false` and that no explicit triggers are defined for the panel. 在典型網頁開發案例中，如果您定義觸發程序，或如果屬性是`true`如控制項，頁面生命週期期間，會自動呼叫方法。In a typical page development scenario, if you define triggers or if the property is `true` for the control, the method is automatically called during the page life cycle. 如果屬性未定義控制，將會執行任何面板的更新。If the property is not defined for the control, no updates of the panel will occur. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以更新的內容控制當自上次更新後經過時間超過五秒。The following example uses the method to update the content of an control when more than five seconds have elapsed since the last update. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/CS/UpdatePanelUpdateModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/VB/UpdatePanelUpdateModeVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: The property is set to .

span.span: \- or – The method is called during or after the page's event.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates when an control's content is updated.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates when an control's content is updated.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項內的另一個不是控制項面板會根據設定來更新和屬性，以及觸發程序的集合。When an control is not inside another control, the panel is updated according to the settings of the and properties, together with the collection of triggers. 當控制項內的另一個是父面板更新時，會自動更新控制，子面板。When an control is inside another control, the child panel is automatically updated when the parent panel is updated. 內容控制項在下列情況下更新：The content of an control is updated in the following circumstances: - 如果屬性設定為、控制項的內容會更新在頁面任何位置是來自每次回傳。If the property is set to , the control's content is updated on every postback that originates from anywhere on the page. 這包括從控制項內其他的非同步回傳控制項並不是內部的控制項的回傳控制項。This includes asynchronous postbacks from controls that are inside other controls and postbacks from controls that are not inside controls. - 如果控制項內的另一個巢狀控制項，而且父更新面板會更新。If the control is nested inside another control and the parent update panel is updated. - 如果屬性設定為，並會發生下列狀況：If the property is set to , and one of the following conditions occurs: - 您呼叫方法明確控制。You call the method of the control explicitly. - 由控制項所使用的觸發程序定義，所以回傳屬性控制項。The postback is caused by a control that is defined as a trigger by using the property of the control. 在此案例中，控制項明確觸發面板內容的更新。In this scenario, the control explicitly triggers an update of the panel content. 控制項可以是內部或外部定義觸發程序的控制項。The control can be either inside or outside the control that defines the trigger. - 屬性設定為`true`和子控制項的控制項造成回傳。The property is set to `true` and a child control of the control causes a postback. 巢狀的子控制項控制項不會導致外部更新控制除非明確定義的觸發程序。A child control of a nested control does not cause an update to the outer control unless it is explicitly defined as a trigger. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. 此範例會宣告兩個控制項。The example declares two controls. 在第一個面板中，屬性設定為。In the first panel, the property is set to . 在第二個面板中，設。In the second panel, is set to . 外部兩個面板按鈕時，會註冊為非同步回傳控制項上，藉由呼叫方法控制項。A button outside both panels is registered as an asynchronous postback control by calling the method of the control. 在按鈕的`Click`事件處理常式，如果自其上次更新後經過時間超過五秒會呼叫方法的第一個面板。In the button's `Click` event handler, the method of the first panel is called if more than five seconds have elapsed since its last update. 在此案例中，最後一個面板重新整理已五秒以上才會更新面板的內容。In this scenario, the panel’s content is updated only if the last panel refresh was more than five seconds ago. 第二個面板的內容會自動更新。The content of the second panel is always updated. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/CS/UpdatePanelUpdateModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/VB/UpdatePanelUpdateModeVB.aspx#1)]

exception.span: The specified type is not one of the values.

span.span: The specified type is not one of the values.
